text: Alfred Flatow was a gymnast from Germany. Alfred competed at the 1896 Summer Olympics. He was born on 3 October 1869 and died on 28 December 1942.Alfred Flatow == References == Category:1869 births Category:1942 deaths Category:German gymnasts Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Gda≈Ñsk
title: Alfred Flatow
